Title: Epicenter
Description:
There is the creature standing between us and that magic hammer. It certainly made an impact when it landed here in the Ringing Deeps, didn't it? Look at the size of that crater!

With the pollen and water splashed on you like this, you should be able to approach that beast and, theoretically, not be harmed. You'll blend right in with it!

But if it does turn aggressive, don't worry, I'll be right behind you.

We'll get that hammer out of here safely!
PortraitGiverText: Attracted to the powerful energies of Fearbreaker, it will not relinquish territory without a fight.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Moira Thaurissan in the Living Grotto.
RewardText:
Why that amber-sucking, slime-spined, travesty of an earthen! I've met troggs with more honor!

He took Fearbreaker! He took my family's hammer and left us to die to that creature!

This cannot stand. I will not allow such disrespect to you... or to me.
